name: I Support Breast Cancer Research
description: The Breast Cancer Research Foundation is an independent, not-for-profit organization which supports clinical and transnational research on breast cancer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 - Standard on-board GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Sound card
